creditline: Gift from James Lally in honor of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: Small cup with small foot and flaring mouth; blue and white with small fowers and insects on exterior; 6 characters on bottom
markings:
K\'ang-hsi mark and period (1622-1722);
\'K 50\', on sticker fragment, on bottom
medium: Porcelain with blue decoration under clear glaze
title: Wine Cup
